I am working on isolating the problem to get a MWE but this is the error I am seeing
```ERROR: GPUCompiler.jl encountered an unexpected internal error.
Please file an issue attaching the following information, including the backtrace,
as well as a reproducible example (if possible).

InternalCompilerError: length(frames) == 1, at /home/aleonard31/.julia/packages/GPUCompiler/uTpNx/src/validation.jl:246```
if I comment out a line using an enum as an argument I do not see a error

text: The issue seemed to be when converting an `Int` (enums base type) to the enum itself...it was late so I gave up and forced all the enums to be converted to `Ints` instead
